attributes.action: encourage the cultivation and preservation of trees and other plants in the streets, gardens and rooftops of British towns and cities, just as he is for  forest nations.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Visiting London,I am shocked at the "deforestation" taking place on our own doorsteps. This is a time when we should be finding more space for plants and trees, not less. New (and old) houses should be incentivised to include roof gardens, or at least not to deter weed growth. Growing trees and wild plants is a valid way of reducing CO2, even if it doesn't count in the current data collection.
